reporting-org.narrative: Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture (UNESCO)
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

title.narrative: Strengthening national capacities to develop and deliver quality E-Learning in higher education institutions in Jordan

description.narrative: This project will be linked to the work being done by UNESCO on E-Learning through the Global Education Coalition, as well as key regional support such as the development of legal frameworks for E-Learning. UNESCO will also build on its previous successful experience with similar projects in particular UNESCO's project in partnerships with the Queen Rania Teacher Academy, focusing on Blended Learning Approaches to qualify educators. The project aims at improving the quality of e-Learning and the national higher education system in Jordan through supporting the National Center for E-Learning and Open Educational Resources.
